description: This file implements core functions for an object array component in C, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It provides mechanisms to create object instances, initialize their member variables, and manage object array functionalities such as setting size, adding, removing, and finding elements. The code appears to be part of a larger object-oriented C framework, using function pointers and struct inheritance patterns.

classes.name: ANSC_OBJECT_ARRAY_OBJECT
classes.description: Structure representing the object array, including function pointers for array operations and member variables.

classes.name: ANSC_COMPONENT_OBJECT
classes.description: Base component object structure from which the object array derives common properties.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscObjectArrayCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes an object array component instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscObjectArrayCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes and frees the object array instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscObjectArrayCOEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required objects for the array component.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscObjectArrayCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes member variables and functions of the object array instance.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayGetSize
methods.description: Retrieves the current size of the object array.

methods.name: AnscObjectArraySetSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the object array.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayRemoveAll
methods.description: Removes all elements from the array.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayGetAt
methods.description: Gets the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscObjectArraySetAt
methods.description: Sets an element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayInsertAt
methods.description: Inserts an element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayRemoveAt
methods.description: Removes the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayAdd
methods.description: Adds an element to the array.

methods.name: AnscObjectArraySetGrowth
methods.description: Sets the growth factor for the array.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayFind
methods.description: Finds an element in the array.
